original_text: I can hear people who are calling out. It sounds like a woman who is giving birth to her first baby. She is calling out with great pain. It is Jerusalem who is crying! She is calling out for help. She says, ‘Help me! I am very weak. These murderers have come to kill me!’ I can hear people who are calling out. It sounds like a woman who is giving birth to her first baby. She is calling out with great pain. It is Jerusalem who is crying! She is calling out for help. She says, ‘Help me! I am very weak. These murderers have come to kill me!’ I can hear people who are calling out.
korean_text: 내가 소리를 들은즉 여인의 해산하는 소리 같고 초산하는 자의 고통하는 소리 같으니 이는 시온의 딸의 소리라 그가 헐떡이며 그의 손을 펴고 이르기를 내게 화가 있도다 죽이는 자로 말미암아 나의 심령이 피곤하도다 하는도다

sentences.original_text: I can hear people who are calling out.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 부르짖는 사람들의 소리를 들을 수 있습니다.

sentences.original_text: It sounds like a woman who is giving birth to her first baby.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 첫 아이를 낳는 여인의 소리 같습니다.
